name: WWF WrestleMania: The Arcade Game
overview: Take on wrestling to the EXTREME with intense action straight from the arcade smash! It's in-your-face mayhem with punishing head-to-head and team matchups and grueling WWF and International title bouts! Pummel your senses with devastating new moves and authentic play-by-play commentary from Vince McMahon! No pain, no game!
